content.text:
# The Sporting News College Baseball Player of the Year Award

The 'The Sporting News College Baseball Player of the Year Award' was an award given by The Sporting News to the best college baseball player of the year. The award was given annually from 1964 to 1990, and then sporadically after that until 2001.
Winners
